name: Only Climber
description:
Reach the top by setting off towards the heights! Will you be able to reach the end on this path of challenging obstacles?

Only Climber is a game to reach the top, created by combining many platform elements. It has a single-player structure in the FPS genre. Feel the challenge in the world of many different themes in this game, which shows that reaching the top has never been this difficult. In this game where there are no save points, if you fall down you have to start from the beginning. You must choose the right step in every step you take because a wrong step can cost you dearly. If you want to win, never give up and enjoy your victory!
